snippet: Berlin's annual film festival, the Berlinale, showcases a total of 395 films from around the world in its 62nd installment, which runs from Thursday through Feb. 19.
abstract: Berlin's annual film festival, the Berlinale, showcases a total of 395 films from around the world in its 62nd installment, which runs from Thursday through Feb. 19.
lead_paragraph: Berlin's annual film festival, the Berlinale, showcases a total of 395 films from around the world in its 62nd installment, which runs from Thursday through Feb. 19. Among these movies, 18 are world premieres in the running for the festival's highest honors, the Golden and Silver Bear trophies.

headline.main: In Berlin, 395 Films, 18 Premieres, and 1 Award to Streep
